This looks like a nice Gyaru story. Is there any way to commission someone to translate this?
...that all said, I want to add that a) yes the joint artist tag is a terrible idea, and b) I wonder how protag's niece will react at finding out he has been banging one of her friends.

In case no one gets around to translating it: Dude moves out of Tokyo but has to work remotely. His niece's gyaru-looking friend claims she's super experienced, has a salaryman boyfriend and used to live in Tokyo. Protag gets ribbed over still being single, and decides to try a dating app, only to end up meeting his niece's friend (who lies about her age) via said app. She asks him to keep it a secret, claiming it'd be bad for both of them if someone found out, and protag agrees in exchange for getting to have sex with her. This keeps going until the holidays, where he finally gets her to admit that she's not experienced, never had a boyfriend, and that protag was her first. They sort of make things official after that.
Fun Fact: Their are alot of artist that eventually will make NTR etc aka hardcore etc work eventually.
